conversation.content: It's nice to have some company, even if it's just a quiet moment together. We can just be here for a bit if you'd like.
sure but the thing is I cann t express myself

It can feel really frustrating when the words just won't come out, like there's this blockade between what you're feeling and being able to share it with someone else. Sometimes it helps to start small, like just noticing what's going on in your body when you try to express yourself - are you feeling tense, or maybe a bit stuck?
